name: All Media Guide
overview: All Media Guide, LLC, a business-to-business company, provides entertainment descriptive content and content management technology to support the physical and digital distribution of entertainment media. It provides content database for exploring music, movies, and games. The company creates the database of information and original editorial content. Its content and technologies are licensed by various business customers, including e-commerce and content websites, consumer electronics hardware and software companies, in-store kiosks, and media technology companies. The company serves online entertainment retailers, content providers, and technology companies. All Media Guide, LLC was founded in 1991 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan. As of December 14, 2007, All Media Guide, LLC operates as a subsidiary of Rovi Corporation.
